info.description: This is a dummy backend for an ecommerce store.
info.title: E-Commerce Backend API

get.description: API for fetching all the cart products.

put.description: API for updating the quantity for a cart product.

post.description: API for adding an product the cart.

delete.description: API for removing a product from cart.

post.description: API for making a product as favorite.

delete.description: API for removing a product as favorite.

get.description: API for getting all favorite products.

post.description: API for user login using email and password
API for placing an order with the products in the cart.

get.description: API for fetching all the orders of a user.
get.summary: Get all orders of a user.

get.description: API for fetching all the reviews for a product made by multiple users.
get.summary: Get all reviews for a product.

parameters.description: The number of products to fetch
parameters.name: limit

get.description: API for renewing the access token. The refresh token is set in the http-only cookie when the user first logs in so renewing the token will only work if the user have logged in atleast once.

post.description: API for adding a product review by user.

put.description: API for updating a product review by user.

delete.description: API for deleting a product review by user.

post.description: API for adding user addresse used as delivery address.

put.description: API for updating a user address.

delete.description: API for deleting a user address.

get.description: API for fetching all user addresses.
